advancements.ghoul.rotten_food.descripti: Eat rotten food as a Ghoul.

Receive strength from your fellow Goblins.

advancements.halfling.halfling_cooking.d: Use your Halfling touch to speed up the cooking process.

advancements.traveler.first_traveler_tel: Used the Traveler Teleport ability for the first time.

origin.fantasyorigins.cursed.name: Cursed
origin.fantasyorigins.cursed.description: Those whose very soul has been cursed by unknown forces from beyond the Void.
origin.fantasyorigins.cursed-form.name: Cursed
origin.fantasyorigins.cursed-form.descri: Those whose very soul has been cursed by unknown forces from beyond the Void.
origin.fantasyorigins.dwarf.name: Dwarf
origin.fantasyorigins.dwarf.description: Dwellers of the Deep. They live in the dark and mine all day.
origin.fantasyorigins.elf.name: Elf
origin.fantasyorigins.elf.description: A graceful and ageless people who value nature deeply.
origin.fantasyorigins.ghoul.name: Ghoul
origin.fantasyorigins.ghoul.description: Undead scavengers that eat the rotten flesh of their enemies.
origin.fantasyorigins.goblin.name: Goblin
origin.fantasyorigins.goblin.description: Greedy tribesmen who overwhelm their enemies with numbers.
origin.fantasyorigins.halfling.name: Halfling
origin.fantasyorigins.halfling.descripti: Small people with a passion for adventure.
origin.fantasyorigins.orc.name: Orc
origin.fantasyorigins.orc.description: The stronger and bigger Overworld cousins to the Piglins of the Nether.
origin.fantasyorigins.traveler.name: Traveler
origin.fantasyorigins.traveler.descripti: Mysterious Wanderers that come from beyond the Void.
origin.fantasyorigins.triton.name: Triton
origin.fantasyorigins.triton.description: Ocean dwellers that sometimes venture onto the surface.
origin.fantasyorigins.wolfkind.name: Wolfkind
origin.fantasyorigins.wolfkind.descripti: Wolf people that are fast and ferocious.
power.fantasyorigins.alpha.name: Alpha
power.fantasyorigins.alpha.description: Tamed Wolves get boosted stats while around Wolfkind.
power.fantasyorigins.bow_mastery.name: Bow Mastery
power.fantasyorigins.bow_mastery.descrip: Elves are masters of archery, their arrows do 50% more damage, and they can summon 32 arrows every 5 minutes.
power.fantasyorigins.cursed_form_biology: The Cursed form grants extra strength, more health, and increased size.
power.fantasyorigins.cursed_form_healing: While transformed Cursed regen health faster.
power.fantasyorigins.dark_vision.name: Dark Vision
power.fantasyorigins.depth_sleep.name: Dwarven Slumber
power.fantasyorigins.depth_sleep.descrip: Having lived far underground for generations, Dwarves are unable to sleep above elevation 32.
Travelers have the ability to easily travel between the Dimensions. (Activate while sneaking to choose Dimension)
power.fantasyorigins.dimensional_wear.de: Traveler's bodies are weakened due to wear from Dimensional travel.
power.fantasyorigins.dry_fatigue.name: Dry Fatigue
power.fantasyorigins.dry_fatigue.descrip: Triton's fatigue faster out of water.
power.fantasyorigins.dwarven_might.name: Dwarven Mining
power.fantasyorigins.dwarven_might.descr: Dwarves have evolved to mine faster underground. Your break speed is increased for blocks below elevation 32.
power.fantasyorigins.dwarven_size.name: Dwarven Size
power.fantasyorigins.dwarven_size.descri: Dwarves are half a block shorter than Humans.
power.fantasyorigins.dwarven_skin.name: Dwarven Skin
power.fantasyorigins.dwarven_skin.descri: Dwarves have tough skin, granting them a natural armor bonus.
power.fantasyorigins.dwarven_smelting.de: Furnaces and Blast Furnaces within 16 blocks of Dwarves smelt at twice the normal rate
power.fantasyorigins.elven_agility.name: Elven Agility
power.fantasyorigins.elven_grace.name: Elven Grace
power.fantasyorigins.elven_grace.descrip: Elves are able to fall any distance without harm, and walk on powder snow.
power.fantasyorigins.family_truce.name: Family Truce
power.fantasyorigins.family_truce.descri: Orcs are distant cousins of Piglins and as such have a truce not to attack on sight.
power.fantasyorigins.fish_diet.name: Fish Diet
power.fantasyorigins.fish_diet.descripti: Triton's have adapted to get more nutrition out of all types of fish, cooked or not.
power.fantasyorigins.frail_body.name: Frail Body
power.fantasyorigins.frail_body.descript: The Curse leaves your body weakened in your base form.
During a full moon Wolfkind are faster and stronger.
power.fantasyorigins.ghoulish_stature.de: Ghouls are smaller than most creatures.
power.fantasyorigins.ghoulish_stomach.de: Ghouls are immune to Hunger and Poison.
power.fantasyorigins.goblin_greed.name: Goblin Greed
power.fantasyorigins.goblin_size.name: Goblin Size
power.fantasyorigins.goblin_size.descrip: Goblins are slightly shorter than Humans.
power.fantasyorigins.goblin_tribe.name: Goblin Tribe
power.fantasyorigins.goblin_tribe.descri: Other Goblins won't attack unless provoked.
power.fantasyorigins.halfling_cooking.de: Furnaces and Smokers within 16 blocks of Halflings cook at twice the normal rate
power.fantasyorigins.halfling_luck.name: Halfling Luck
power.fantasyorigins.halfling_luck.descr: Halfings are known to be very lucky. Better drops from mobs and chests.
power.fantasyorigins.halfling_size.name: Halfling Size
power.fantasyorigins.halfling_size.descr: Halflings are half the size of Humans.
power.fantasyorigins.halfling_sneak.name: Halfling Sneak
power.fantasyorigins.halfling_sneak.desc: Due to their small size Hobbits can blend into their surroundings and appear invisible when sneaking.
power.fantasyorigins.heat_exhaustion.des: The Cursed suffer from heat exhaustion in their cursed form so they tire fast.
power.fantasyorigins.heavy_armor.name: Dwarven Pride
power.fantasyorigins.heavy_armor.descrip: Dwarves refuse to wear armor that isn't made from the finest of metals. You can only wear heavy armor.
power.fantasyorigins.inbetween_worlds.de: Travelers are constantly stuck between worlds so they can easily pass through other entities.
power.fantasyorigins.knowledge_of_all_wo: Traveler's gain experience at an accelerated rate due to their multi-dimensional nature.
Elves deal less damage with close quarter weapons.
power.fantasyorigins.misshapen_body.name: Misshapen Body
power.fantasyorigins.misshapen_body.desc: Due to the transformation changing the Cursed's body too drastically, they cannot wear armor in their Cursed Form.
power.fantasyorigins.no_ranged.name: Ranged aversion
power.fantasyorigins.no_ranged.descripti: Orcs are proud warriors that value skill in close combat above everything else, deeming ranged weaponry as tools for cowards.
power.fantasyorigins.ocean_power.name: Ocean Dweller
power.fantasyorigins.ocean_power.descrip: Triton's are able to see under water and swim fast.
power.fantasyorigins.orc_reach.name: Orc Reach
power.fantasyorigins.orc_reach.descripti: Orcs are able to reach further.
power.fantasyorigins.orcish_hunger.name: Orcish Hunger
power.fantasyorigins.orcish_hunger.descr: Orcs suffer from extreme hunger and need to eat far more than most.
power.fantasyorigins.orcish_rage.name: Orcish Rage
power.fantasyorigins.orcish_rage.descrip: Orcs can call upon their bottled up rage to increase their strength for 30 seconds.
power.fantasyorigins.orcish_stature.name: Orcish Stature
power.fantasyorigins.orcish_stature.desc: Orcs are naturally larger than most.
power.fantasyorigins.orcish_stomach.name: Orcish Stomach
power.fantasyorigins.orcish_stomach.desc: Orcs are immune to Hunger and Poison.
power.fantasyorigins.orcish_warrior.name: Orcish Warrior
power.fantasyorigins.orcish_warrior.desc: Orcs deal extra damage due to their immense strength.
power.fantasyorigins.pack_mentality.name: Pack Mentality
power.fantasyorigins.pack_mentality.desc: Wolves will not attack Wolfkind unless provoked.
power.fantasyorigins.poison_attack.name: Poison Attack
power.fantasyorigins.poison_attack.descr: Due to their diet and general rotting nature, Ghouls poison victims when attacking.
power.fantasyorigins.rotten_diet.name: Rotten Diet
power.fantasyorigins.rotten_diet.descrip: Ghouls exclusively eat Rotten Flesh and Spider Eyes.
power.fantasyorigins.strain_of_dimension: Traveler's exhaust quickly due to the strain of feeling all the Dimensions around them.
power.fantasyorigins.strength_in_numbers: Goblins are stronger when surrounded by other Goblins.
power.fantasyorigins.sun_aversion.name: Sun Aversion
power.fantasyorigins.sun_aversion.descri: Like most undead; Ghouls burn in daylight if not wearing a helmet.
power.fantasyorigins.surface_blindness.d: Too much sunlight blinds Dwarves unless they are wearing helmets
power.fantasyorigins.surface_fatique.des: Dwarves exhaust faster on the surface.
power.fantasyorigins.traveler_teleport.d: Traveler's are able to slip between Dimensions to move quickly, similar to teleportation. (Secondary Ability)
power.fantasyorigins.traveler_truce.name: Traveler Truce
power.fantasyorigins.traveler_truce.desc: Due to their multi-dimensional nature; Enderman and Travelers won't attack each other unless provoked.
power.fantasyorigins.triton_biology.name: Triton Biology
power.fantasyorigins.triton_biology.desc: Triton's are suited to marine life so when they go on land their bodies dry up reducing their overall health, but while they're in water they have increased health.
power.fantasyorigins.triton_spawn.name: Ocean Spawn
power.fantasyorigins.triton_warrior.name: Triton Gladiator
power.fantasyorigins.triton_warrior.desc: Triton's deal extra damage with tridents.
power.fantasyorigins.undead_brethren.des: Other Undead creatures do not attack Ghouls unless provoked.
power.fantasyorigins.wolfkind_biology.de: Wolfkind are fast but weaker due to their lean stature.
power.fantasyorigins.wolfkind_diet.name: Wolfkind Diet
power.fantasyorigins.wolfkind_diet.descr: Wolfkind are able to consume raw meat and get extra nutrition from it.
